stmt.name: create_tbl
stmt.sql: CREATE TABLE tbl (uu_id UUID NOT NULL, vc VARCHAR(10), i INT)

stmt.name: insert_tbl_1
stmt.sql: INSERT INTO tbl (vc, i) VALUES ('test', 0) RETURNING uu_id

stmt.name: insert_tbl_2
stmt.sql: INSERT INTO tbl (vc, i) VALUES ('test1', 1), ('test2', 2) RETURNING uu_id, vc
